==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|Teutschland||obsolete}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|Diutschlant}}, compound word formed from phrasings like {{m|gmh|[[diutsch]] [[lant]]|g=n}}, {{m|gmh|[[diutsch]]e [[lant]]|g=n}}, {{m|gmh|[[in]] [[diutsch]]eme [[lant|lande]]|g=n}}, {{m|gmh|[[ze]] [[diutisch]]eme [[lant|lande]]|g=n}}, {{m|gmh|([[in]]) [[diutsch]]iu [[lant]]|g=n-p}}. The adjective {{m|de|deutsch}} is from Middle High German {{m|gmh|diutisch}}, {{m|gmh|diutsch}}, {{m|gmh|tiutsch}}, {{m|gmh|tiusch}}, from Old High German {{m|goh|diutisc}} (''of the [[people]]''). More at {{l|en|Dutchland}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[ˈdɔʏ̯t͡ʃlant]}} * {{audio|de|De-Deutschland.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Deutsch|land}} ===Proper noun=== {{de-proper noun|n}} # [[Germany]] (a country in Central Europe) # ''short for a [[nation state]], the [[legal person]] comprising the most part of [[territory]] with [[German]] [[dominating]], or its [[territory]] ## {{short for|de|nocap=1|nodot=1|Heiliges Römisches Reich Deutscher Nation}} or {{short for|de|nocap=1|heiliges römisches Reich deutscher Nation}} {{defdate|till 1806}} ##: {{syn|de|Heiliges Römisches Reich Deutscher Nation|heiliges römisches Reich deutscher Nation}} ## {{short for|de|nocap=1|Deutsches Reich}} {{defdate|1871–1945, and later in historical reference}} ##: {{syn|de|Deutsches Reich|Reich}} ## {{short for|de|nocap=1|Bundesrepublik Deutschland}} {{defdate|from 1990}} ##: {{syn|de|Bundesrepublik Deutschland|BRD}} ====Usage notes==== * The article is used when ''Deutschland'' is used as a subject or object in a certain quality, e.g. referencing a certain point in time or period of time. ({{m|en|Germany}} behaves similarly in English: "we went to Germany" uses no article, "the Germany of our grandchildren will be different from the Germany of our grandparents" uses one.) * Plurals, when they occur, are {{m|de|Deutschland}}, {{m|de|Deutschländer}} or {{m|de|Deutschlande}}. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|country (abbreviation)}} {{l|de|Dtl.}}, {{l|de|Dtschl.}}, {{l|de|Deutschl.}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Gesamtdeutschland |Großdeutschland |Mitteldeutschland |Norddeutschland |Ostdeutschland |Süddeutschland |Teildeutschland |Westdeutschland |Deutschländer |Deutschlandfrage |Deutschlandfunk |Schland }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|DDR}} * {{l|de|deutsch}} * {{l|de|Deutscher}}/{{l|de|Deutsche}} ===See also=== * {{sense|country (translingual abbreviation)}} {{l|mul|D}}, {{l|mul|DE}}, {{l|mul|DEU}}, {{l|mul|de}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Countries in Europe]] [[Category:de:Germany]]
